title: Thunderbird abroad - in Greece I can neither send or receive emails on any account.
creator: P.e.rawlings
content: I use thunderbird in UK with several emails accounts. Works splendidly on desktop and mobile. Now in Greece I can neither send or receive emails on any account. But Gmail and outlook work fine. Is there a firewall problem or similar? Thanks
metadata: ;os:Android;solver_id:7058483;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36
